DisplayText.Title: eSports Supporter 4
DisplayText.Body:
Continue your Black Steel Characters in our latest eSports Supporter Pack, including Black Steel Locust and more!

This Pack also contains a brand new Weapon Skin set to take into battle:  'Assembly'.

CHARACTERS
Black Steel Dizzy 
Black Steel Sam 
Black Steel Tai Kaliso 
Black Steel Locust Drone 
Black Steel Locust Grenadier

WEAPON SKINS
Assembly

EMBLEM
Assembly

DisplayText.Title: Weapon Collector 2
DisplayText.Body:
Stand out on the battlefield with eye-catching weapon skins! 

Weapon Collector 2 features five Weapon Skin sets to collect, including the animated color packed Rainbow Dust weapon skin!

This Pack also contains a bonus opportunity to find the Locust Grenadier Elite early!

WEAPON SKINS
Rainbow Dust (Animated)
Disco Ball
Black Marble
Marble
Copper

BONUS CHANCE TO FIND
Locust Grenadier Elite
